DOC.brief_summary: Efficacy adverse effect Benjakul recipe Treating Primary Osteoarthritis Knee Compared Diclofenac . This study design double blind , randomize control trial . Approval ethical committee Human Research Ethics Committee Thammasat University ( No : 1 Faculty Medicine )
DOC.brief_title: Clinical Efficacy Safety Benjakul Recipe Treating Primary Osteoarthritis Knee Compared With Diclofenac
DOC.criteria: 1 . Patients primary osteoarthritis knee grade IIII Kellgren & Lawrence criteria 2 . Not breast feed 3 . Not pregnancy good contraception 4 . Volunteer normal Complete Blood Count laboratory , lipid profile , liver function test renal funtion test 5 . Do abuse drug 6 . Good cooperation 1 . BMI > 32 2 . History peptic ulcer , Gastroesophageal reflux disease ( GERD ) , heart disease , liver disease kidney disease 3 . History allergy diclofenac allergy herbal medicine
